sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均可表示"从一处移往另一处"之意。
means: move ： 普通用词，指从一处到另一外的任何距离的转移。
shift ： 侧重位置与方向的改变。
transfer ： 一般表示转送或移交迁移，尤指交通运输中的换乘或职务的调动等。
remove ： 作"移动"解时，与move可换用，还可指撤职或开除学藉等。

sentence.Network_en: Anton was able to transfer from Lavine's to an American company.
sentence.Network_cn: 安东成功地从拉文调到了一家美国公司.

sentence.Network_en: Encouraging teacher transfer would not, by itself, integrate the teaching corps.
sentence.Network_cn: 鼓励教师调动本身不会消弭教学队伍中的种族隔离。

sentence.Network_en: He wants to transfer some money to the account of his daughter.
sentence.Network_cn: 他想把一些钱转到女儿的账户上。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 转字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 转业〖 betransferredtocivilianwork〗 转移〖 shift;transfer〗 转译〖 conversion;translate〗.
母语迁移这一概念是在20世纪四五十年代兴起的对比分析理论中提出的。“迁移（transfer）是一个心理学术语，指先前的学习对后继学习的影响。起促进作用的影响，其效果是正向的，被称为正迁移；起干.
线上聊天的英文简写 ... 5,gimme=give me= 给我 6,xfer=transfer= 传输 7,em=them= 他们的宾格.
IM in heaven !!! - 方力缩 - 网易博客 ... 交易明细查询 Transaction detail enquiry 转账 Transfer 银行卡类型 Card Type.

list.abs: 移情现象与心理工作者的自律移情（Transference）由弗洛伊德于20世纪初首次描述，是“面对新个体时重新定位了... 死亡的感觉是什 …
什麽是情感转移(transference)? (A) 案主对个案工作者的爱慕之情 (B) 案主对个案工作者的抗拒心态 (C) 案主将自己的生活经验中人际.
可转移性（Transferability）：当知识产生后几乎可以不需再花费任何的成本就可以转移至其他个体上；而外显知识可借由沟通的方式 …
...就可能对个人财产采取某种措施。第三是可转让性（transferability），如果财产不能转让，就无法通过自愿交换将资源转移到更有效 …
可转让信用证系指特别注明“可转让（transferable）“字样的信用证。可转让信用证可应受益人（第一受益人）的要求转为全部或部分由另一受益人（第二受益人）兑.
英语四级重要短语_百度知道 ... transformable a. 能改变的，能改造的 transferable a. 可转移的，可转让的 transferer n. 转让者.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb): from French transférer or Latin transferre, from trans- 'across' + ferre 'to bear'. The earliest use of the noun (late 17th cent.) was as a legal term in the sense 'conveyance of property'

entry.def: If you transfer something or someone from one place to another, or they transfer from one place to another, they go from the first place to the second.

example.ex: Remove the wafers with a spoon and transfer them to a plate...
example.tran: 用勺子抄起薄饼，把它们转盛到盘子里。

example.ex: He was transferred from Weston Hospital to Frenchay…
example.tran: 他从韦斯顿医院转院到了法兰查。

entry.def: If something is transferred, or transfers ,from one person or group of people to another, the second person or group gets it instead of the first.

example.ex: I realized she'd transferred all her love from me to you...
example.tran: 我意识到她已把所有的爱从我身上转移到了你身上。

example.ex: The chances of the disease being transferred to humans is extremely remote…
example.tran: 该疾病传播到人类身上的几率微乎其微。

entry.def: Technology transfer is the process or act by which a country or organization which has developed new technology enables another country or organization to use the technology.

example.ex: The Philippines needs capital and technology transfer...
example.tran: 菲律宾需要资本与技术转让。

example.ex: There will be a transfer of technology from this country to Mongolia.
example.tran: 这个国家将会向蒙古国进行技术转让。

entry.def: In professional sports, if a player transfers or is transferred from one club to another, they leave one club and begin playing for another.

example.ex: ...Nick Barmby who transferred from Spurs to Middlesbrough...
example.tran: 从热刺队转会到米德尔斯伯勒队的尼克·巴尔姆比

example.ex: He was transferred from Crystal Palace to Arsenal for £2.5 million.
example.tran: 他以 250 万英镑的身价从水晶宫队转入阿森纳队。

entry.def: If you are transferred, or if you transfer ,to a different job or place, you move to a different job or start working in a different place.

example.ex: I was transferred to the book department...
I suspect that she is going to be transferred...

entry.def: When information is transferred onto a different medium, it is copied from one medium to another.

example.ex: Such information is easily transferred onto microfilm.
example.tran: 这种信息很容易转存到缩微胶卷上。

example.ex: ...systems to create film-quality computer effects and then transfer them to film.
example.tran: 创造胶片级电脑画质并将之转录到胶片的系统

entry.def: When property or land is transferred, it stops being owned by one person or institution and becomes owned by another.

example.ex: He has already transferred ownership of most of the works to a British foundation...
example.tran: 他已把大部分作品的所有权转让给一家英国基金会。

example.ex: Certain kinds of property are transferred automatically at death.
example.tran: 死亡时某些财产会自动转让。

entry.def: If you transfer or are transferred when you are on a journey, you change from one vehicle to another.

example.ex: He likes to transfer from the bus to the Blue Line at 103rd Street in Watts...
example.tran: 他喜欢在华兹区第 103 大街下公交车转乘地铁蓝线。

example.ex: 1,654 passengers were transferred at sea to a Norwegian cruise ship.
example.tran: 1,654 名乘客在海上转搭了一艘挪威游轮。

entry.tran: 转印纸(纸上面印有图案，可通过加热或压力转印至其他材料上)
entry.def: Transfers are pieces of paper with a design on one side. The design can be transferred by heat or pressure onto material, paper, or china for decoration.
A transfer is a ticket that you get when you leave a bus or train that allows you to go on a different bus or train without paying again.

means.word_mean: 1. the act of transporting something from one location to another
2. someone who transfers or is transferred from one position to another;

sentences.sentence: "the best student was a transfer from LSU"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of transfering something from one form to another;

sentences.sentence: "the transfer of the music from record to tape suppressed much of the background noise"

means.word_mean: 4. a ticket that allows a passenger to change conveyances
5. application of a skill learned in one situation to a different but similar situation
6. transferring ownership
1. move around;

sentences.sentence: "transfer the packet from his trouser pockets to a pocket in his jacket"

means.word_mean: 2. transfer somebody to a different position or location of work
3. move from one place to another;
4. lift and reset in another soil or situation;
5. cause to change ownership;

sentences.sentence: "I transferred my stock holdings to my children"

means.word_mean: 6. change from one vehicle or transportation line to another;

sentences.sentence: "She changed in Chicago on her way to the East coast"

means.word_mean: 7. send from one person or place to another;
8. shift the position or location of, as for business, legal, educational, or military purposes;

sentences.sentence: "He removed his children to the countryside"
"Remove the troops to the forest surrounding the city"

means.word_mean: 9. transfer from one place or period to another;

sentences.sentence: "The ancient Greek story was transplanted into Modern America"

auth_sentence.content: Transfer to the fridge and chill for one hour.
auth_sentence.res_content: Transfer to the fridge and chill for one hour.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Transfer to the fridge and chill for one hour.

auth_sentence.content: Transfer to the oven and cook for ten minutes.
auth_sentence.res_content: Transfer to the oven and cook for ten minutes.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Transfer to the oven and cook for ten minutes.

auth_sentence.content: Transfer to a wire rack to cool before serving.
auth_sentence.res_content: Transfer to a wire rack to cool before serving.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Transfer to a wire rack to cool before serving.

infer[v.推论,推断]+ent+ial……的→adj.推论性的

Sentence.sentence: I've heard that at a factory in the area two pregnant women who were working with paint requested a transfer to a safer department, because they wanted to prevent damage to their unborn babies.
They requested to transfer to a safer department
Another myth about eyes is that they can be replaced, or transferred from one person to another.

When these students encounter a new problem of the same type on a test, they're able to transfer the knowledge they've gathered more effectively than those who were the passive recipients of someone else's expertise.

In order to begin tackling the challenge, the Institution recommends that: The UN Food and Agriculture Organisation work with the international engineering community to ensure governments of developed nations put in place programmes that transfer engineering knowledge, design know-how, and suitable technology to newly developing countries

I made an effort to get my supervisor to transfer me to another department, but he urged me not to complain too loudly, because the administration is more likely to replace me than the X-ray equipment.

means.word_mean: 转移; 迁移

sentences.en: The company has transferred to an eastern location.
sentences.cn: 这家公司已搬到东部某地。

sentences.en: I intend to transfer the property to my son.
sentences.cn: 我想把这笔财产转给我儿子。

means.word_mean: 转让; 让渡

sentences.en: To preserve the farm intact, he transferred it to one heir.
sentences.cn: 为了保持这个农场的完整,他将它移交给一个继承人。

means.word_mean: 转会（尤指职业足球队）

sentences.en: That footballer has been transferred to AC Milan.
sentences.cn: 那个足球运动员已经转会到AC米兰队。

means.word_mean: 改变；转变；变换

sentences.en: to transfer wasteland into fertile fields

means.word_mean: 转移; 转让; 转录

sentences.en: The manager arranged for his transfer to another football club.
sentences.cn: 经理安排他转会到另一个足球俱乐部。

means.word_mean: 中转, 换乘, 改变路线

sentences.en: You can take the subway and then transfer to a bus.
sentences.cn: 你可先乘地铁然后换乘公共汽车。

means.word_mean: [美国英语]换车(或船)；（使在旅途中）转乘，换乘，倒车

sentences.en: At Birmingham I transferred to another coach.
sentences.cn: 我在伯明翰换乘另一辆大客车。

means.word_mean: [美国英语]转学；转校；转系；转会；调动

sentences.en: She has transferred from the Department of History to the Department of English.
sentences.cn: 她已经由历史系转到英语系了。

jushi.english: The shop closed and the business was transferred somewhere else.
jushi.chinese: 那家店铺已经关门,迁到别处去营业了。
